name: Ancient Lamp (Anime)
text: Activate only If you control a "La Jinn the Mystical Genie of the Lamp". When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls, except the attacking monster; the attacking monster attacks it instead, and you proceed to damage calculation, then Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster Card (Spellcaster/WIND/Level 3/ATK 900/DEF 1400). (This card is still treated as a Trap Card). While this card is an Effect Monster, when an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls, except the attacking monster; the attacking monster attacks it instead, and you proceed to damage calculation.
